bibl.title: First Notes on Menander's Sikyonioi.
bibl.note: By-products of work devoted to Menander's Sikyonioi during preparation of a third volume for the new Loeb edition of Menander. - I. The play title. - II. The speaker of the prologue. - III. Two details of the plot. - IV. Passages of text (1-109 Kassel): 13-15, 19-20, 25-51,27, 29, 52-62, 72-109, 80, 95-96.
ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, First Notes on Menander's Sikyonioi.
